message_1: Find the discrete logarithm of 3 (base 7) mod 17.
message_2:
To find the discrete logarithm of 3 (base 7) mod 17, we need to find an integer x such that:

7^x ≡ 3 (mod 17)

We can start by calculating powers of 7 modulo 17:

7^1 ≡ 7 (mod 17)
7^2 ≡ 15 (mod 17)
7^3 ≡ 6 (mod 17)
7^4 ≡ 9 (mod 17)
7^5 ≡ 13 (mod 17)
7^6 ≡ 12 (mod 17)
7^7 ≡ 1 (mod 17)

We can see that none of these powers are congruent to 3 modulo 17. However, we can continue by multiplying the last result by 7:

7^8 ≡ 7 (mod 17)
7^9 ≡ 15 (mod 17)
7^10 ≡ 6 (mod 17)
7^11 ≡ 9 (mod 17)
7^12 ≡ 13 (mod 17)
7^13 ≡ 12 (mod 17)
7^14 ≡ 1 (mod 17)

Again, none of these powers are congruent to 3 modulo 17. We can continue this process:

7^15 ≡ 7 (mod 17)
7^16 ≡ 15 (mod 17)
7^17 ≡ 6 (mod 17)
7^18 ≡ 9 (mod 17)
7^19 ≡ 13 (mod 17)
7^20 ≡ 12 (mod 17)
7^21 ≡ 1 (mod 17)

Once again, none of these powers are congruent to 3 modulo 17. However, we notice a pattern: the powers of 7 modulo 17 repeat every 6 powers. This is because 7 has order 6 modulo 17. Since we have not found a power of 7 congruent to 3 modulo 17, we can conclude that there is no discrete logarithm of 3 (base 7) mod 17.
